text: gupta lokagala kili kaigalella avana baliyalle ive. Avugalannu ballavaru avana horatu beraru illa. Avanantu nelabhaga hagu jalabhagadalliruva ellavannu ballavanagiddane. Avana arivige barade ondu eleyu uduri biluvudilla. Bhumiya kattalugalalliruva yavude dhan'yavagali, yavude hasi vastuvagali, ona vastuvagali ondu spasta granthadalli dakhalagade ulidilla
